title: AI-Enhanced Heart Disease Prediction Modeling Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental computer literacy and understanding of basic statistical concepts
context.additional_context: For managers with healthcare decision-making authority: a self-directed learning environment utilizing personal devices

learning_goals: Understand the core principles of a cardiac disease prediction model and explain data-driven decision-making processes
Replicate the operational mechanism of a hybrid model combining CNNs and optimization algorithms using visualization tools
Build a predictive model with classification accuracy exceeding 85% using a real-world medical dataset (similar to the Cleveland Dataset)
Interpret model performance metrics (accuracy, precision, recall, F1-score) and apply them to outcome reports
Formulate an implementation plan to integrate AI-based prediction systems into organizational health management strategies
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
